articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
What is slippage? 🧠 
It is the difference between the expected price of an order and the price when the order actually executes
Due to the volatility of #cryptocurrency, the price of an asset can fluctuate often depending on trade volume and activity

articles.description:
Pony Index is a single, interest-bearing token designed to offer diversified, one-click exposure to secure stablecoin yields sourced from multiple vault strategies.
Interested in learning more about this new @Scalara_xyz managed index? 
Join the launch event!
Pony Finance: 💫 Join us for the launch event!
Meet the Pony Finance team and guests from @beefyfinance and @Scalara_xyz for details on the PONY Index, $PONY, and the liquidity mining program.
📆 Tomorrow! Thursday, June 23 at 6pm UTC / 2pm ET.
Save Your Spot👇
